Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Among users of aspirin , they were : rofecoxib 1 . 73 ( 1 . 52 , 1 . 98 ) , celecoxib 1 . 34 ( 1 . 19 , 1 . 52 ) , ibuprofen 1 . 51 ( 0 . 95 , 2 . 41 ) , diclofenac 1 . 69 ( 1 . 35 , 2 . 10 ) , naproxen 1 . 35 ( 0 . 97 , 1 . 88 ) and acetaminophen 1 . 29 ( 1 . 17 , 1 . 42 ) .

| ibuprofen |
| diclofenac |

These are the disease entities identified in the paragraph. They are all names of non-prescription and prescription medications, often used to treat pain, inflammation, and fever. These medications are also known as non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) and acetaminophen.
